attributes.action: Move the 30 hours a week free childcare hours forward 2017 not 2020 in scotland.
attributes.additional_details: 2017 move date forward to help working class People with childcare costs.2020 is to long things need to change for economy for our country
attributes.background: People in Scotland who work are penalised and can't afford to provide for there families.2020 is to long away

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: 

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
